English.Text: Your diplomat's voice soothes everyone around him. He firmly grasps the officer by the shoulders and helps him lie down on his side. He gently instructs the officer to picture a toy horse, rocking softly back and forth with his every breath. Now that the man is not panicking, a small stream of air finds its way through his swollen windpipe, but an urgent treatment is required to remove the toxins from his body before it causes more damage.
